about_the_game:
An erotic VISUAL NOVEL featuring HD graphics, steamy ANIMATIONS, and realistic-looking characters.
Lily and James’s casual date night at Dave’s bar takes a wild turn when Lily stumbles upon a steamy scene at the glory hole. Fooling around with a stranger is one thing, but can James handle watching his wife get naughty with his best friend?

GAME DESCRIPTION

Join Lily and James on their quest to spice up their marriage.

EPISODE 5

Looking forward to some quality time with his wife, James invites Lily to have some drinks at his best friend’s bar, hoping for a fun and relaxed evening. But their simple date takes an unexpected turn when Lily stumbles upon a glory hole Dave has secretly set up in the back of the bar, disguised as a regular restroom.

Intrigued by the sight of a pink-haired beauty fooling around with a stranger and fueled by the alcohol buzzing through her veins, Lily sends James a teasing video of her taking her own turn with the anonymous man. However, James isn’t the only one watching, and Dave can’t keep his arousal in check. Turned on beyond words, he boldly asks James if he’s open to sharing Lily with him.

Will James give in to Dave’s bold request?
Can he handle watching his wife get naughty with his best friend?

Follow the story to find out.

FEATURES

- HD renders and animations
- Video and image gallery

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is intended for adults and includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. 
The characters, story, and actions are fictitious. 
All characters depicted are 18 years old and over.
Contains nudity, alternative lifestyles, graphic depictions  of oral, vaginal, anal, masturbation and non-penetrative sexual acts, bodily fluids.
Contains lesbian and straight sex scenes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
